title: In Development Plan area, development around natural lake shall be governed by the provisions made in such plan
clause_text: In Development Plan area, development around natural lake shall be governed by the provisions made in such plan. In absence of the provisions in such plan the distance as may be specified by Irrigation Department shall be followed.
section: Distance from Natural Lake and Dam

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
